metadata.title: Ombre Curtains Kitchen Blackout Curtain Polyester Blend Drapes 27.5x39 Inch Pink Gray Gradient Textured Art Pattern Curtains Rod Pocket Set 2 Panels
features: üîê Quality Material: The curtains are made of breathable and lightweight polyester fabric, professional sewing conditions and exquisite workmanship, and strive to make every detail perfect.
üîê Simple Design:2 panel curtain per package.Each curtain panel measures 27.5 inch wide by 39 inch long.
üîê Good To Go:1.6-inch inner diameter.Fit easily with standard curtain rods.All sets for you to put them up right away.

üîê Various Uses:Window treament curtain panels can be used in living rooms,kitchens,bedrooms,bathrooms,patio sliding doors,apartments,storage rooms,studios,dorms,lofts,office workspaces,high ceilings,factories,hospitals,cafes and hotels.
üîê Care Tips:Machine Wash in cold water,gentle cycle,do not bleach,liner or tumble dry low,cool iron if needed.
description: Set includes 2 panels blackout curtains for bedroom of 27.5x39 inches 42x63 inches 42x84 inches 52x52 inches 52x63 inches 52x72 inches 52x84 inches 52x90 inches 52x96 inches 42x45 inches 42x54 inches 52x45 inches with grommets top each. Suitable for most curtain rods on the market for a hassle-free usage. Suitable for most curtain rods on the market for a hassle-free usage.
Window panel is crafted from soft and durable polyester and polyester fabric. Very beautiful and comfortable curtains for you to choose.
Curtains provide a safe and private home environment for you and your family. It's a awesome choice for those who work 3rd shift, take a nap and people who enjoy sleeping during daylight hours.
Machine washable in cold water. Do not bleach, tumble dry in low settings.
Decorate your home, high quality. Nice pre-sale and after-sale service. Your satisfaction is our first priority.
